alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 3:42PM CDT until April 23 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County. .Heavy rainfall received Wednesday afternoon caused the Sac River to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, minor Flooding occurs at the gage site. The campground at Caplinger Mills floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this afternoon to 13.3 feet and then begin rising this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Saturday afternoon at 230 PM CDT.
